data.text: Slow. For an App that is sponsored on the big stage of UFC, I expected a way more fluid user experience. The UI is confusing and average at best. Some crypto needs you to buy in specific increments and the app doesn't automatically do that for you, you have to manually adjust. Unacceptable in my opinion. I expected more from this app. In app customer service was responsive so that's good. Deposits worked well. Selling is a little easier than buying. 3/5 ‚≠ê.
data.replyText: Hello there. Please contact us over In-app or Web chat. We will gladly look into any performance difficulties you have encountered with the Crypto.com App and offer assistance as well as address any questions or concerns you may have.

data.text: Overall misleading marketing practices. I mostly have been trying to use the visa card, but it hardly works anywhere, and there's all these claims about getting cash back but it's at very specific locations and not entire chains. Any money on the card is basically locked up with no way to withdraw it. The quests are expensive. Overall not a beginner friendly app and misleading in many ways. There are much better options available
data.replyText: Hello Kyler! We welcome you to reach out to us via our web or in-app chat. We will gladly look into the difficulties you reported with the Crypto.com Visa card and advise you further. Thanks!

data.text: Log in experience is just downright horrible! What kind of developers decided to let a ads popup cover the bottom half of the number options for entering PIN? I had to verify via email, verify via SMS, then the app asked for PIN which I wasn't able to provide because the popup covered the numbers I needed to enter, and then it locked me out because I failed to log in 3 times! Unbelievable!
data.replyText: Hi there. We'd be happy to look into the login difficulties experienced and help you access your account. For further assistance feel free to contact us via web chat.

data.text: High spread, I truly hate the delay in the total asset amount. I do not know why my "option" trades decrease in value by a crazy amount while the price is way over my prediction and increasing. I think this app has a lot of potential, but it definitely needs work still. Would like to see better charts as well it's currently very limited. I'll give it 3 stars for now. Hopefully, changes are made.

Prices don't sync right among other problems. But it has the most crypto though. If issues would be fixed then I'd rate 5 stars."Update"still same problems but worse I've lost $5k+ because of these issues I bought a coin at .011 it went up to .0139+ and It sold for almost the same price I bought it at. made $20 when I should have made $500. currently it's not worth buying/selling a coin unless it 2x's or more because you won't get anything out of it. Tried talking support, no help won't respond.
data.replyText: Hi there! We invite you to reach out to us via our Live chat or at contact@crypto.com. Our team will be happy to learn more about your review and assist with the difficulties you are experiencing with the Crypto.com App.

data.text: Wanted to test a few different apps before deciding on a good crypto wallet / investment. Unfortunately this app doesn't give you easy access to withdraw your funds. You have to setup a special wallet and even then you can't withdraw your money unless it's $100 USD. Definitely feels like a scam to keep your money. There are better apps out there for crypto that give you better access to your money. I would avoid an account with this one.
data.replyText: Hello Jaret, we will be glad to clear up any concerns that you have regarding our platform and assist you with your withdrawal. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us via our web or in-app chat so we can help you.

data.text: This is the absolute worst experience I've had with a crypto app. First of all, they require transfers to external wallets to be at least $100. Now I have crypto stuck in this app that had I used literally any other crypto app I would have access to. It was also just a nightmare to use, not user friendly at all. I had to deposit enough in to make my balance at or above $100 to be able to transfer it somewhere else. The having to login anytime you exited the app was also a headache. Do not like
data.replyText: Hello Sean. We will gladly address your pending concerns regarding the Crypto.com App. Kindly send us a message via Live chat or email us at contact@crypto.com. Our team will assist with your balance and deposit queries you are having. Thank you!

data.text: Download if you wanna lose money, crypto prices does not reflect current prices. All BS! Very useful to buy and hold crypto currency but......price of currency not accurate at all! When selling the price is lower and when buying the price is higher than what "current" price is! Please fix asap! People losing money because of this and I am sure I am not the only one! Could used better chart and or more advances indicators too.
data.replyText: Hey there. We would be happy to assist with the case at hand - please share your referral ID or contact us via in-app chat or email (contact@crypto.com).

data.text: Terrible interface, and customer service, with at best shady business practices. They are either selling expired up/down options or advertising different prices than exist. I got notifications multiple times about prices rising while my up options were being automatically closed (expiring), and vice versa. I was locked out of my account while I had options open. It took 4 days after getting back into my account saying it had been a while since my email and if I still needed help to let them know
data.replyText: Hi Hunter. We'd gladly assist you further with the difficulties you have encountered with the Crypto.com App. In case you have already reached out to our team via Live chat or email at contact@crypto.com, we will make sure that you will be contacted back and assisted as soon as possible. Thank you!

data.text: Very good app, but what's the point if you have ZERO customer support. It is literally impossible to speak to a human about an issue or concern. Deposit money into crypto very easily, and withdrawal is usually easy as well. But if something happens... you are ENTIRELY out of luck. There is absolutely no one who can help, and no one who cares. I wish you were as quick to respond to my support emails as you are to respond to bad ratings on here! I requested assistance MULTIPLE TIMES! NOTHING!!!
data.replyText: Hi Chris! Our team will gladly assist you further if you have encountered any issues with the platform. If you have contacted us via live chat or via email at contact@crypto.com, rest assured that you will be assisted as soon as possible.

data.text: The app in general works fine (there are glitches sometimes but after app restart it seems back to normal). The main concern that I really don't like is the support option! It says they are answering within 2 hours but I always wait a couple of days for their reply, even I send messages right after they replied, in a few seconds. This is really annoying.

This application is deceptive. Unexpected fees appear at every turn. While I understand the need for security, the constant requirement to log in and perform excessive authentication is very frustrating. However, what truly disappointed me was when I made a transfer from this app to an external wallet, and it charged a fee equivalent to half of my investment, without prior notice. Fortunately, I was not dealing with a large sum of money, but this experience felt highly deceptive.

Frustrating issue keeps happening. For no apparent reason I am unable to purchase crypto. I keep getting an ERROR: REJECTED popup notice. Called my bank. Not an issue on that end. Contacted customer support. No response and it's been 2 days. This is the 2nd time that this has happened. The 1st time took almost 2 weeks to get resolved. Very unhappy with this app!
data.replyText: Hello Kadi! We would be happy to look into the difficulties you have encountered when initiating crypto purchases and assist you accordingly. To do so, please send us a message via Live chat or email us at contact@crypto.com. Thank you!

data.text: This app gets slower every time it updates. It's soo slow now that I can barely get on... (edit: Since I said what I said above, now the app is really giving me problems. Even if I have full cell signal, when I start this app, my signal strength drops to 1 bar or none. No other apps I have do this...) (edit 2: They fixed it. Cool. Running smoother now.)
data.replyText: Hello there! We release updates to address and improve different aspects of our platform, including new additions based on the requests of our users. You are welcome to get in touch with us via Live chat or via email at contact@crypto.com, so we can offer assistance with any difficulties you may have encountered.

data.text: Just will not open the app. When I tap on the app, a very short flash goes by, like the app was about to open, but that's it. My phone just stays on the home screen. I do that a couple times before a popup says "app keeps closing." I tried the website, but it just points me back to the mobile app. EDIT: They fixed it pretty fast! Wow.. You guys are quick. Thanks. I'll try the app out now. 3 stars for a speedy and helpful response.
data.replyText: Hi, Jordon. We would gladly look into the login difficulties you have encountered and offer assistance. To do so, please get in touch with us via our Live chat or at contact@crypto.com.

data.text: Having issues using the app on Google Pixel 7 Pro. App does not start, it stays on the Blue screen just after opening and force closes. Would like to get back into the app to check balances, but unable to do so with this issue persistening. Edit: App now works after update which I'm relieved to see. Still a wonderful app, regardless of the issue I was having.
data.replyText: Hello, Gregory! We would be glad to take a further look into the difficulty you have experienced with accessing the Crypto.com App and assist you accordingly. Please contact us via Live chat or via email at contact@crypto.com.

data.text: Biggest scam app you can deal with, sure adding money is easy, withdrawing it? A variable nightmare dealing with fiat wallet hooking up to your bank account. Took hours and I eventually just gave up. The money is lost because the creators didn't think enough to add a number to call. Or if they did you can't find it in this damned app.
data.replyText: Hello there! Our team will be happy to look into the withdrawal difficulties you have encountered and address any concerns you might have. Please send us a message via our Live chat or at contact@crypto.com with more details on the matter.

data.text: The app has been good up until now. I can't access the app or my account. I emailed customer support. No response. This to say the least is concerning. They fixed it but now 2 days later the app isn't working again. This app continues to crash. It's down more than it's up. This is a big problem. I'm thinking it time to close out my account once I can get back on the app. This is disappointing. Please tell me when I can access the app and my account.
data.replyText: Hello, Arthur! If you have already reached out to us via Live chat or at contact@crypto.com, rest assured you will be assisted with the access difficulties that you face as soon as possible. Thank you!

data.text: Almost impossible to fund the account. Almost all cards and banks are blocked. Support is slow and useless. From hours of research chase is the only one that allows ACH transfer, and that takes days. Also to get set up they need your driver's license, social security and selfie. But once setup, the card and earn system works. Would probably not use for actual trading.
data.replyText: Hello there! Please send us a message via Live chat or email us at contact@crypto.com. We will gladly provide you with additional information on our products and services, and address any concerns you may have. Thank you!

data.text: My app will not open. Just keeps getting an error message that the app keeps closing. üòî UPDATE: They had me email them my issue and..... they fixed it! Thank you soooo much! ‚ù§Ô∏è changed from a 1 star to 5! And.... now I've emailed a quesion twice and get no response. There's really no FAQ or anything on deposits, withdrawls, fiat? Wallets? When can I withdraw funds to an external wallet? And when will i know when i can? Do i have to wait for every transaction? Please respond to my email.

data.text: The app keeps crashing version 3.176.2. It was working fine but last week they did something that starting crashing. Today the app doesn't even open. How can I open a case when the App does not even open? I have cleared the cache, reset the App, uninstalled, reinstalled and still just getting a Blue screen! I tried to chat support but after 30 minutes and no one is available besides this message "Thank you! A member of our team will contact you shortly"
data.replyText: Hi, Armando. We invite you to contact us via our Live chat or at contact@crypto.com, so we can help with the difficulties you have encountered accessing our platform. Thank you!

data.text: Most strike up/down options are sold at instant loss because they sell them well above current market value. Deriv contract interface often lags out and requires a complete phone restart to fix as well. Really horrible if that happens when you're trying to sell, only to come back to a loss because of the app simply not loading. Support is getting slower and slower at replies as well, been waiting over week now. Other than deriv contacts, go for it. Avoid their derivs because of the crashing.

it has upsides and downsides, I used to be able to put money on here strait from my debit card but now I have to wire it which is wierd and inconvienent. easy to transfer crypto on and off the exchange to other crypto wallets, staking is easy here and a pull out at any time option is available, no chart to monitor my overall progress which would be nice, been waiting on the card for over 3 years now, customer service is no help. app can be confusing at first but once you figure it out it isn't b
data.replyText: Hi Ben. We welcome you to reach us via Live chat or at contact@crypto.com. We'd be glad to look into your Crypto.com Visa card enquiry and provide you with more information on the available deposit options.

data.text: Worst app ever. I have concert tickets. Apparently I'm required to install the app to access my tickets except its impossible to sign up. Keeps saying my cell number is wrong. I've literally had the same number since cell phones became a thing so no, I don't have another number associated with my email. I've checked my email setting and as I already knew, my cell phone is connected with my email address. Whats the point of an app no one can sign up with? No one at supports gets back to me.
data.replyText: Hi Shawn! We will be more than happy to look into the matter and help you out with the difficulties you are facing when signing up. Please reach out to us via Live chat or email at contact@crypto.com, so we can assist you. Thank you!

data.text: Stalling again, not working well. Too much emphasis on a "game like" app. Poor choice. Fix this: while in 'your account' if you click on "crypto wallet" it opens up a list of coins you own. If you click on the dollar amount just to the right of the word 'wallet' you see every coin. Why is this still happening? I'm in my account, I should only ever see what I own. There are two other areas to look for coins one doesn't own. And yes, I've told customer support some time ago.
data.replyText: Hello, Dave. We truly appreciate your feedback as hearing the opinion of our users helps us to better understand your needs and improve our services. You‚Äôre welcome to contact us via our in-app chat or email at contact@crypto.com, if you have any other suggestions!

data.text: I have tried following previous advice, such as restarting my phone, clearing data from this app, and even uninstalling and reinstalling. So that means there are some bugs within the app itself that need to be fixed.The value of a coin displayed in the UpDown option purchase section does not reflect what is shown in the Position Details section. If I try to close early to take advantage of a temporary gain, or minimize my losses, a lot of times I have run into problems. Still needs to be fixed.
data.replyText: Hello, Michael! You are welcome to get back in touch with us via Live chat or email at contact@crypto.com. We would like to take a closer look into the difficulty that you have experienced with the UpDown Options feature and assist you further. Thank you!

data.text: I've been trying to open this app for two days. Uninstalling redownloading, calling support and being rejected because it was not the number for that issue not forwarded, no reply from the emails, and adjusted permissions, trouble shooting, etc. I've sent or the messages left through the official website support. I would NEVER recommend an app with only one way to get your money out and a complete lack of support from the company.
data.replyText: Hello there, if you have contacted us via our live chat or at contact@crypto.com, we can assure you that our team will provide you with a response as soon as possible and help you with accessing our platform.

data.text: App is quite good, especially with the new skin. My main complaint is the card part of the app. It looks basic and slow. Why not build around that when so many people use it for the cards? Really, any design would be better than what we have.. could even be a separate app that would allow for other people (partners) to view the account and transactions.

Overall a great beginner friendly exchange. Fees are a little high but not obsurd. Only reason it did not receive 5 stars is pretty consistenly *before* it asks you for a password/fingerprint, it will flash your full account balance just for a second. This I feel is pretty important for obvious reasons. Other than this small issure there is plenty of rewards and rebates you can get and very user friendly. Definitely recommend if you're looking for somewhere to get started in spot trading

App not working after most recent March update and it requires updates too often. Update: I've noticed a few people are having trouble with the App since the latest update and keep being told to contact customer support. I have tried several times now but the chat service link is almost impossible to find and does not even work. I can't use the in-App messaging service because the app won't even start. I've read from several comments that calling yields no results but I'll try that next.
data.replyText: Hi there! Please send us a message via web chat or in-app chat. Our team will gladly assist with any application difficulties you are having. Thank you.

data.text: App won't launch after last patch (11/3/24), just keeps crashing over and over. Been using for 3 years before I realised how vulnerable my money is if the app dies and I can't access my wallets. Edit* had a few pending Android updates I needed to do, once I upgraded and reinstalled crypto app it works again. I've amended the review, but it's not the first time the app has 'died'...
data.replyText: Hi John! We would gladly take a closer look at the difficulties faced with the Crypto.com App after the last update. To do so, please reach out to us via our web chat, so we can help you access your account. Thank you.

data.text: Extremely slow UI. All card rewards are basically gone so they're practically useless. Huge fees when transferring crypto to another wallet, I tried to send ‚Ç¨70btc to a friend and literally lost half of it. You can't even use the app if it's not up to the latest update which is extremely frustrating if you need to access your card/funds quickly. On top of this & the slow UI, you get hit with about 3 pop ups for random features every time you open the app too. Not worth it anymore.

Very slow, latest update crashes the app .. cannot use for second day... cannot top up the card, getting really annoyed with this. trying to change my address for a more than a month now, no answer,or a stupid generic email" if your query stil valid, let us know..." Response to your response: do you think I haven't contacted the support? I HAVE!
data.replyText: Hi there. Please send us a message via our web chat or in-app chat. Our team will gladly assist with updating your address. Any additional pending queries will also be addressed.

data.text: Very disappointed with the service. If you claim to need to "verify my address", you don't need 3 days to do it. Especially after I asked about it multiple times and your agents were of absolutely zero help, telling me to use the "in-app chat" when I WAS ALREADY THERE IN THE FIRST PLACE. Use another platform for crypto. This one is worthless.
data.replyText: Hello Henry, we assure you that if you have reached out to us via our web or in-app chat, our team will provide you with a response as soon as possible and assist you with your address verification.

data.text: Notifications can not be turned off unless one does the full disable on the phone. Then you don't receive any information (for example, if someone got into your account, you wouldn't know) Fees - If you have a physical card, they charge you for not using it. When buying tokens, it is one of the most expensive. The app is okay for complete beginners, but not for advanced users. Ex, to reach your assets, one needs to do too many steps to reach the information needed.

App got consistently worse over time. Everything is so cluttered, everytime I open the app there's an announcement that doesn't go away until I tap it, navigating the app is so slow, and no it's not my device/internet, app was much faster compared to a year ago on the same device. The final nail in the coffin is the horrible support experience these past months. They used to reply literally within a few minutes last year, now they reply after 2 weeks (if they reply). I'm looking at other options

After the latest update I can't even open the app. I accidently deleted my review where they replied saying get in touch using their chat on the app! I can't open the app at all. It "stops" before it opens! I have no access to my crypto wallet. Do not use this platform. This happens far too often. I now do not have access to thousands of pounds worth of crypto. Reply to Developer: I cannot contact you via chat as I cannot get the app to open and your website just links back to the app.
data.replyText: Hello Paul! We will gladly look into any performance difficulties you have encountered with the Crypto.com App and offer assistance. Please contact us over In-app or Web chat. Thank you!

data.text: I have been using this app for the past 2 years. I have never had an issue before, until 2 weeks ago when tried to buy $150 worth of coins. When I made the purchase a message popped up saying the payment didn't go through, but $150 was still taken from my bank account. I've messaged the help team twice now and both times I've been told I need to speak to a specialist. I've then waited four days for a response and received nothing but the chat being ended.
data.replyText: Hello, Michael! We will be glad to look into the transaction in question and assist accordingly. In case you have already contacted us via our in-app or web chat, our team will make sure to reach you back as soon as possible.

data.text: Dodgy app that worked fine until it updated and then doesn't work on my phone at all therefore not giving access to your account or help functions, not recommend. Revised text.... What a joke, I sent you emails and I sent you help requests on your app and you couldn't be bothered responding, but once I post a publicy available negative review you quickly respond to try and look good and totally ignore the fact that I've already tried to contact you multiple times.

data.text: Customer support is literally not available. My money is stuck in the app. There is no way to reach out for help. Not in chat, not by email. I have a verification issue, and I submitted the supporting document. All went to the air. I have my crypto stuck there. This is a real spam.

data.text: I have been unable to withdraw my crypto from wallet for going on 5 days now. Customer service once I finally (long wait) got a hold of a human (and not a bot) they walked me through ID verification bc they thought originally that that was the problem. The had me navigate to tabs on the app that didn't exist to which their response was 'oh you must be on a different version of the app.' Follwed by 'is there anything else I can help you with today'? They acted like they solved problem. Nope.

data.text: Worst app I've ever used. Cost me Thursdays unable to tradeü§¨ü§¨It's actually garbage. data.text: Customer service is very very slow.. They do not even read messages all the time and if they do they never help with anything, just give generic answers and then close the ticket. I would never trade here again, I've been told other platforms are much better such as Kraken.

data.text: The one and only problem I have with this app is that I have to update it every week almost- it's in the best interest of users-and they've built up an exciting, in depth, yet fun and engaging app for trading crypto currency. I'll admit it's much easier now than it was once. Before, with the two step id! Oh god! Please don't make me.

data.text: Absolutely terrible experience/company. Customer service is completely non existent. I use several different crypto wallets. Trust me on this one, don't touch it. Tried to find further help by joining their discord.. that was full of scammers and by me simply requesting assistance for money being sent to crypto and not giving me access or showing it's existence, I was removed from the discord. This is my only review of an app ever.

data.text: In short terrible customer service. It says they will get back to you in a couple of hours and it's more like 4 or 5 days. They apologise for the terrible service but offer no service, just that do you still have the problem. Then you wait another 4 or 5 days. The last update has caused my app not to work, so I'm locked out with dreadfull customer service. I believe the problem is that my phone is a Samsung 7 as I installed the app on my wife's phone and it opened no problem. Waiting atm

data.text: Horrible app. Customer service is horrible they don't assist you with anything. They say the issue is being excalated and it's been over a week and not yet resolved. They freeze your crypto debit card and you can't move the funds or use the physical or virtual card, your money is stuck until they un freeze the card. They take alot of fees with every crypto purchases selling and trading. This app is going down hill. I would recommend everyone to use a different app like coinbase with better serv

The app and customer service is shocking. I was locked out my account for 2 weeks, after getting back access ive not been able to trade for the last 3 weeks. Tried contacting via email and chat, you get no response for days then get a automated email saying apologies for the delay if you still have an issue go back to chat, then the cycle starts again. Instead of sending an automated response days later, try addressing the person issue.. Would advise anyone to stay clear from this platform

It shouldn't be this hard to withdraw money from the fiat wallet that has been set up following their instruction.

data.text: They allowed me to buy the whole first week with no fee which was nice. Then they asked for KYC verification never mentioned it before that. Now my account is locked with 7000 dollars and I can't do anything at all just sit an helplessly watch. It's been well over a week I've been waiting on my verification. They shouldn't allow you to spend that kindve money then take away any control over it. Its Rediculous..

data.text: Still has extortionate exchange values for topping up your crypto card, and they do not disclose why or what this is based on. For example topping up ¬£180 is about $245 of cypto and ¬£1800 is about $2470. The more you exchange the more you pay on percentage. There are better options.

I put in my new phone number, but I keep getting an error message that says try again later. I've been trying for 3 days now, multiple times per day. The automated system does nothing but tell me to do what I'm already doing, and the customer service line is only for card services.

data.text: It's been a great way to buy crypto, alot more choices then some well known exchanges. Updown options was good when first introduced, now they front run your bids in there favor! You automatically start off almost $100 negative.

This may be a big company but their support is terrible their bot answers your complaint then tells you its beyond what they can answer and refers you to a specialist, but they never answer .i have money stuck here for 12 days now and its still not credited to my account from an e transfer .the app freezes and will not allow you to leave any more messages. Leaving e mails has no response . Do not trust your money in this app or even on the desktop

data.text: This was one of the best crypto wallets... but now they are worse than a bank. The customer service is SLOW & they flat out refuse to allow you to talk to anyone higher up. Horrible people!!!!!!

data.text: It's great but my constructive criticism is that they need to have a constant total of profits shown compared to total investment without having to look at individual crypto and also make the tax forums be available for download from the app. It's honestly really shocking they don't have these two features for how big this app is. Definitely lacking behind other competitors. Also market data value is lagged behind live prices of crypto.

Nonexisitng customer support, which is just what you want when it comes to handling money. Support doesnt reply for days, then deletes your ticket if you dont reply immediately. There is no ticket history (intentional), so youll be in a perpetual loop of opening tickets about the same question. Plus side: this keeps your participation at minimum; an effective speed bump.
